## UnescapeSegment type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type UnescapeSegment<S extends string> = S extends `${infer Prefix}~1${infer Suffix}` ? UnescapeSegment<`${Prefix}/${Suffix}`> : S extends `${infer Prefix}~0${infer Suffix}` ? UnescapeSegment<`${Prefix}~${Suffix}`> : S;
```
